name: Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided
name_original: Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided
description:
Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Sony Online Entertainment. It came out on 26-06-2003. LucasArts Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided on PC.
John Donham produced the game. It was directed by Raph Koster.
